title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday

Save on popular tech products (that would also make good gifts). (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Happy Monday! There's no better way to start off the week than finding a great deal on a product you actually want. Not only do you get the rush of online shopping, but you also get to save a little in the process. There's a boatload of deals over at Amazon today on popular products like Instant Pots, Kindles, Halloween candy, and so much more. Not only have we tested these things, but we've also price tracked them, so you know you're getting your money's worth. Check out all the ways you can save.

1. $50 off: A smarter Instant Pot

Upgrade your Instant Pot with smart technology. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

The Instant Pot is already popular for it's speedy pressure cooking abilities, but if you want to upgrade with fancy features, you're going to want to get the Instant Pot Smart WiFi. It's one of the best multicookers we've ever tested because it was the most efficient, precise, and intuitive model. It comes with a wonderful app that lets you control your cooking from anywhere in your home and choose from pre-programmed recipes, but you can still use the buttons if you're so inclined. Right now, you can get it for $50 off and the lowest price we've ever seen.

Get the Instant Pot Smart WiFi 6 Quart for $99.95 (Save $50)

2. Lowest price: The best car charger we've ever tested

Keep your devices juiced up on your next road trip. (Photo: RavPower)

As you start thinking about your holiday travels, you might want to add a USB car charger to your list. On a long road trip, you do not want to end up with a dead phone battery, especially because we use these things for navigation, music, and phone calls. This one from RavPower is the best car charger we've ever tested because it's has two-ports for charging and had a powerful charge (less than two hours) despite its small size. Right now, you can get it for the lowest price we've ever seen outside of lightning deals.

Get the RavPower Mini Dual USB Car Charger for $6.99 (Save $2)

3. Up to 25% off: Your favorite Halloween candy

Save big on your favorite candy—just in time for Halloween. (Photo: Nestle / Brach's)

Halloween is right around the corner, and if you haven't stocked up on candy for trick-or-treaters (or yourself), now is the best time to do so. Right now, you can Nestle assorted mixes, controversial candy corn, and low-sugar SmartSweets for up to 25% off. This could be one of your last chances to save on Halloween candy before the big holiday, so grab some before the ghosts and ghouls come knocking on your door.

Save up to 25% on Halloween Candy

4. Lowest price: An affordable roasting rack

Make sure your bird is perfect this Turkey Day. (Photo: Reviewed / Lindsay D. Mattison)

If you don't want to overcook your turkey (again) this Thanksgiving, then we recommend getting a solid roasting rack. This one from Circulon is our favorite affordable roasting pan because it worked just as well as some of the more expensive models. The nonstick surface may need to be replaced over time, but this is a cooking product you'll only use a few times a year. Right now, you can get it for just under $30 and the lowest price we've ever seen.

Get the Circulon Roaster with U-Rack for $29.99 (Save $4.01)

5. $40 off: The best Kindle on the market

Treat yourself to an unlimited library. (Photo: Reviewed / Michael Roorda)

Whether you're an avid reader or are searching for a gift for your favorite bookworm, this is the deal for you. Right now, the Kindle Paperwhite is just $90 for Prime members only, which is $5 more than its Prime Day price. This is an insane deal for anyone who wants an unlimited library. It's the best e-reader we've ever tested because of its incredible interface and its recent upgrade to having twice the amount of storage and being waterproof. If you want a more low key Kindle, you can get the original Kindle for $25 off, too.

Get the Kindle Paperwhite for $89.99 (Save $40)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
